content: March 29 The financially distressed city of Scranton  Pennsylvania  will soon sell its public sewer utility to a subsidiary of American Water Works Company Inc. for $195 million  according to local news reports.
name: American Water Works
title: Scranton  Pennsylvania to sell sewer utility for $195 mln
